name: HaikuReader

Invocation Name: haiku reader
des:
Enable the Haiku Reader to hear silly haikus relating to my 2018 goals. Listen and hold me accountable!

"Alexa, as Haiku Reader to read me a poem."
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
